Name: Black & White Daiquiri
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE berries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: A blackberry and coconut flavoured Daiquiri.
History: Created by yours truly, named after the blackberries and the white coconut rum bottle.
